item.title: Install TrueNas core on PVE
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial, I will cover how to configure Truenas-core 13.0 using Proxmox 8.1.3, including the utilization of external HD as data storage. installation: Download the latest ISO version of TrueNas-core from here. You can directly insert the link of the ISO file on PVE by navigating to “Disk” > “ISO Images” > “Download From URL” > “Enter URL” and then click “Query URL”.
